QuestionText: Would you rather have the ability to fly, breathe underwater, speak every language, or be invisible at will?
Would you rather always have free Wi-Fi wherever you go, never have to wait in line again, always get free food at restaurants, or have unlimited data on your phone?
OptionB: Never have to wait in line again
OptionC: Always have free Wi-Fi wherever you go
OptionD: Always get free food at restaurants
CorrectAnswer: Never have to wait in line again

QuestionText: Would you rather travel back in time to meet your ancestors, travel forward in time to meet your descendants, be famous in your lifetime, or live forever?
OptionA: Travel back in time to meet your ancestors
OptionB: Travel forward in time to meet your descendants
CorrectAnswer: Travel forward in time to meet your descendants

QuestionText: Would you rather give up social media for a year, eat only your favorite food for a year, never watch another movie, or never listen to music again?
OptionB: Eat only your favorite food for a year
OptionC: Give up social media for a year
CorrectAnswer: Give up social media for a year

QuestionText: Would you rather win the lottery once, have a perfect memory, always find the best deals when shopping, or have your dream job?
OptionA: Always find the best deals when shopping

QuestionText: Would you rather never be stuck in traffic again, always wake up refreshed, never lose your keys, or instantly learn new skills?
OptionC: Never be stuck in traffic again

QuestionText: Would you rather be able to teleport anywhere, read minds, pause time for everyone but you, or be exceptionally lucky?
OptionB: Pause time for everyone but you

QuestionText: Would you rather always have the newest technology, have unlimited vacation days, never get sick, or have a personal chef?
Would you rather live on the beach, in the mountains, in a bustling city, or on a peaceful farm?
Would you rather be able to stop time, change your appearance at will, speak to animals, or have super strength?
